name: Lipton Green Tea Clear
description: Made from a blend of the finest teas from around the world, Lipton teas are known for its rich strong taste. The combination of excellent quality high grown teas provides Lipton tea with the perfect colour, taste and aroma. Thus making it a preferred brand in North America, Australia, Europe, Middle East and Asia – a No 1 tea brand operating in over 110 countries. Tea known as a health-promoting beverage with many beneficial effects. The beneficial effects generally attributed to antioxidants properties of its naturally occurring polyphenols e.g catechins *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
